definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Take care to avoid to put your fingers on polished surface.
sentences.chinese: 小心避免安装时别将手指碰到阀内磨光面上。

sentences.english: I let go of her hand and she reached out to touch a pair of shiny black shoes with a strap and silver buckle.
sentences.chinese: 我松开她的手，她伸手去够一双银搭扣的光面黑鞋。

sentences.english: It always has a number of smooth and micro-magnetic stainless steel fastening screw cap .
sentences.chinese: 它总是有一些光面和微磁性的不锈钢紧固盖螺钉。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the parameter optimization and construction method of smooth blasting of horse-head ingate.
sentences.chinese: 文中详述了马头门光面爆破参数的优化及施工方法。

sentences.english: Mechanism of smooth borehole wall protection blasting and calculation method of the charge are analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了光面护壁爆破的机理和装药量的计算方法。

sentences.english: The striated and polished surfaces are called slickensides .
sentences.chinese: 有条痕的磨光面则称为擦痕面。

sentences.english: A group of optimal smooth blasting parameters are recommended according to the testing results.
sentences.chinese: 根据试验结果，推荐了一组最优光面爆破参数。

sentences.english: It took three shades of car paint to achieve the right color and shiny finish.
sentences.chinese: 最后用了三种颜色的车漆才达到理想的颜色和光面。

sentences.english: Used as varnish on the surface of industrial floor.
sentences.chinese: 作为工业地坪的罩光面漆。

sentences.english: What do you think of the shiny screen?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得光面显示屏怎么样？

sentences.english: MG paper is often used for posters, wrappings, etc.
sentences.chinese: 光面纸常用作海报，包装纸等。
标准混合纤维素微孔膜，白色，光面。

sentences.english: While dueling Veila, Ben appealed to her to break off her attack, hoping to return her to the light side.
sentences.chinese: 跟韦拉决斗时，本劝她停止战斗，希望她回归光面面。

sentences.english: The ultra-thin sheen on the surface of the tart had an almost patent-leather brilliance.
sentences.chinese: 馅饼表层超薄的光面几乎有着黑漆皮的光泽。

definition: to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
